_comment: Ecological Focus Area of Czech Republic. The basic unit of the Ecological Focus Area (EFA) element is represented by the continuous area of agricultural land, as well as non-agricultural land if it fulfils agricultural non-production function. The EFA element could be also represented by other shape that is part of the utilised agricultural area or is adjacent to it. The types of EFA elements are defined in National Regulation 307/2014 Coll.

The types of EFA elements are defined in National Regulation 307/2014 Coll. Temporal extent: 2015-01-01 to 2024-08-01. General information available at https://www.agrihub.cz/micka/en/record/basic?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgeoportal.gov.cz%2Fphp%2Fmicka%2Fcsw%2F%3FSERVICE%3DCSW%26REQUEST%3DGetRecordById%26ID%3D65fd6e8f-eb68-4101-a004-1218c3c0a8017c%23_65fd6e8f-eb68-4101-a004-1218c3c0a8017c
